capsules_submitted.utterance: So I'm an administrator on this platform, and one of the roles that comes with it is to deal with issues like harassment or spam. That's what "filching" refers to - taking something without permission, in this case, content from other users. It's a serious responsibility, but someone has to do it to keep the community safe and respectful.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing teacher and an incredible witch in her own right. I mean, who else can transform into a cat at will? capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always had a lot of respect for Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing educator and an even more impressive witch. As the Transfiguration professor at Hogwarts, she's taught me so much about the importance of discipline and hard work in mastering magic. I'm pretty certain that she's one of the most dedicated professors we've ever had, and I think that's part of why she's so well-liked by everyone on campus.
